message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this unique product. Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. While I appreciate its value, I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $900,000.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While your offer is generous, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. I believe this reflects its worth while acknowledging your interest.
Hello Alice, I understand the value you place on the product, but given my budget constraints, I must respectfully decline the $1,300,000 offer. I would like to propose an offer of $1,100,000.
